stories.title: Server-Side Events as Simple Alternative to WebSockets

stories.text: My moms account got hit by a clone attack where someone cloned her account and is now impersonating her. It’s there any way to force Facebook to take action using dmca request on pictures or other means?
stories.title: Ask HN: Fighting Facebook Clone Scammers

stories.text:
Hi folks, I’m curious if your teams have adopted Twirp (https://twitchtv.github.io/twirp/docs/intro.html) for inter service communication. How has your experience been with it? What are some pain points you’ve had to overcome tabooed adopting it? And while operating Twirp services? What benefits have you realised by adopting Twirp?

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: Are you using Twirp for internal service communication?
Planting a Parkway Tree? Here’s What You Need to Know
Different Ways to Initialize Go Structs

stories.text:
Hi, I am using shared webhosting for an ecommerce site (https://indicbrands.com)

we want to increase our performance in terms of loading time and i found that next step is to move to VPS.

Based on your experience can you share which is minimal requirement of VPS which can fast up the loading time in less then 1.5 or 2 second.

We dont have much visitors, may be daily 200-300 Max as of now.
stories.title: Ask HN: What’s optimal VPS required for fast WordPress hosting?
Kernel Image Lockdown and eBPF Flexibility
Allegations of racism prompt California lawsuit against Tesla
